mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS document ( documentId INT AUTO_INCREMENT, point INT DEFAULT 0, isNotice BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, title VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL, titleBold BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, titleColor VARCHAR(7) DEFAULT 0, content TEXT NOT NULL, likeCount INT DEFAULT 0, dislikeCount INT DEFAULT 0, commentCount INT DEFAULT 0, shareCount INT DEFAULT 0, userId VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, nickName VARCHAR(20), ipAddress CHAR(8) NOT NULL, tags TEXT, regDate DATE NOT NULL, lastUpdate DATE NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (documentId) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (point, isNotice, title, titleBold, titleColor, content, likeCount, dislikeCount, commentCount, shareCount, userId, nickName, ipAddress, tags, regDate, lastUpdate) VALUES (#{point}, #{isNotice}, #{title}, #{titleBold}, #{titleColor}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{dislikeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{shareCount}, #{userId}, #{nickName}, #{ipAddress}, #{tags}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET point = #{point}, isNotice = #{isNotice}, title = #{title}, titleBold = #{titleBold}, titleColor = #{titleColor}, content = #{content}, likeCount = #{likeCount}, dislikeCount = #{dislikeCount}, commentCount = #{commentCount}, shareCount = #{shareCount}, userId = #{userId}, nickName = #{nickName}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress}, tags = #{tags}, lastUpdate = NOW() where documentId = #{documentId};
